subject: Baseball
Education (K-12)
lead_paragraph: R. A. Dickey told fourth and fifth graders at a charter school in Manhattan that reading had taught him patience, a trait that could help him during contract talks with the Mets.
snippet: R. A. Dickey told fourth and fifth graders at a charter school in Manhattan that reading had taught him patience, a trait that could help him during contract talks with the Mets.
